title: Chewy double chocolate cookies
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '5 tablespoons chocolate sauce', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '325g plain chocolate, roughly chopped']
